main_theme: Writing effective, modular specifications is crucial for guiding AI coding agents towards productive and accurate software development.

key_concepts.name: Modular_Specs
key_concepts.description: Breaking down large specifications into smaller, focused modules to avoid overwhelming AI agents and improve adherence to instructions.
key_concepts.key_quote: Avoid monolithic specs. Research shows the "curse of instructions"—too many directives simultaneously reduces adherence. Address one focused task at a time, using hierarchical summaries and sub-agents for complex projects.

key_concepts.name: High-Level_Start
key_concepts.description: Starting with a concise, high-level brief and allowing the AI agent to elaborate the details in a collaborative refinement process.
key_concepts.key_quote: Begin with a concise brief rather than over-engineering upfront. Use "Plan Mode" (read-only) to have the agent draft detailed specs from your vision, then refine collaboratively before execution.

key_concepts.name: Professional_PRD
key_concepts.description: Structuring specifications like a professional Product Requirements Document (PRD) with essential areas like executable commands, testing, and clear boundaries.
key_concepts.key_quote: Organize specs with six essential areas: executable commands, testing procedures, project structure, code style examples, git workflow, and clear boundaries. Use consistent formatting (Markdown, XML tags) for better AI parsing.

key_concepts.name: Self-Checks_Constraints
key_concepts.description: Implementing boundaries and self-checks to guide AI behavior, prevent errors, and ensure safe actions, divided into 'Always do', 'Ask first', and 'Never do' categories.
key_concepts.key_quote: Implement three-tier boundaries: Always do (safe actions), Ask first (high-impact changes), Never do (hard stops). Include conformance testing and leverage domain expertise to prevent predictable failures.

key_concepts.name: Test_Iterate_Evolve
key_concepts.description: Treating specifications as living documents that are continuously tested, iterated upon based on findings, and version controlled.
key_concepts.key_quote: Treat specs as living documents. Run continuous tests after milestones, update specs based on findings, and use version control. Maintain feedback loops between AI output and specification refinement.

key_concepts.name: AI_Discipline
key_concepts.description: The article emphasizes the need for discipline in AI-assisted engineering, stating clear specifications are vital for driving implementation.
key_concepts.key_quote: "Vague prompts mean wrong results." Successful AI-assisted engineering requires discipline: clear specifications become executable artifacts that drive implementation, not afterthoughts.
